meta.job_title: Lead Environmental Service Worker I Trainer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide training and guidance to support service employees to ensure adherence to hospital service standards and customer satisfaction.
Demonstrate and train on the 7 Step Cleaning Procedure to maintain a clean and safe environment for patients, visitors, and staff.
Manage the discharge cleaning process to ensure high standards of cleanliness and neatness in vacated patient areas.
Enforce dress code standards and promote a professional and tidy appearance.
Oversee product usage and equipment maintenance to support the Environmental Services Department.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Managerial experience preferred)
